recipes.title: "Secret's in the Sauce" BBQ Ribs
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                Cut ribs into serving-size pieces; sprinkle with pepper. Place in a 5- or 6-qt. slow cooker. Combine the remaining ingredients; pour over ribs. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or until meat is tender. Serve with sauce.                                        Yield: 5 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as "Secret's in the Sauce" BBQ Ribs in  Taste of HomeAugust/September 2009, p41                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving equals 921 calories, 58 g fat (21 g saturated fat), 220 mg cholesterol, 1,402 mg sodium, 50 g carbohydrate, 2 g fiber, 48 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: Cut ribs into serving-size pieces; sprinkle with pepper.
Place in a 5- or 6-qt. slow cooker.
Combine the remaining ingredients; pour over ribs. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or until meat is tender.
